typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as short,
		{_col1_} as short,
		{_col2_} as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as double,
		{_col6_} as double,
		{_col7_} as string,
		{_col8_} as string,
		{_col9_} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['dbo.trans.csv']) ~> Trans
source(output(
		client_sk as integer,
		alternate_client_id as integer,
		birth_number as integer,
		district_key as integer,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> ClientData
source(output(
		account_sk as integer,
		alternate_account_id as integer,
		district_key as integer,
		frequency as string,
		datekey as integer,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> AccountData
DerivedColums, ClientData lookup(client_id == alternate_client_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ClientSKLookup
Trans derive(insertDate = currentTimestamp(),
		updateDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColums
ClientSKLookup, AccountData lookup(account_id == alternate_account_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> AccountSKLookUp
AccountSKLookUp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		disp_sk as integer,
		alternate_disp_id as integer,
		client_key as integer,
		account_key as integer,
		type as string,
		insert_date as date,
		modified_date as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		alternate_disp_id = disp_id,
		client_key = client_sk,
		account_key = account_sk,
		type,
		insert_date = insertDate,
		modified_date = updateDate
	)) ~> DispDW
